result.reason: LoadBalanceInfo encoder fails for non-Azure RDS farms: users still report broker verification errors even with UTF-8 enabled, likely due to improper handling of user-supplied \r\n suffixes and encoding edge cases in AzureLoadBalanceInfoEncoder
result.approach: Fix AzureLoadBalanceInfoEncoder to strip user-supplied trailing \r\n before re-appending it, ensuring no double-encoding; default is already True so encoding always applies, but the encoder needs to handle on-prem RDS cookie format (tsv://MS Terminal Services Plugin.1.xxx) correctly by normalizing input before UTF-8 re-encoding

attempts.raw_output:
